chapter: Symptoms, signs and abnormal clinical and laboratory findings, not elsewhere classified
category: Symptoms and signs concerning food and fluid intake
title: Insufficient intake of food and water
inclusion: Insufficient intake of food and water (due to self neglect)
exclusion: abnormal findings on antenatal screening of mother
certain conditions originating in the perinatal period
starvation due to privation of food
thirst due to privation of water
